name: Performapal Coin Dragon
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] Other Dragon-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK, also they cannot be destroyed by card effects.
pend_desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Dragon-Type monster you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; this turn, if that monster you control battles an opponent's monster, banish that opponent's monster after damage calculation (even if this card leaves the field).
monster_desc: Other Dragon-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK, also they cannot be destroyed by card effects.
